content:
Hey Implementers,

Just trying to understand the difference between the Communication Request Recipients and the Communication Recipients. Why does Communication contain Group as an allowed Resource Reference but Communication Request does not?
Very good question. Sounds like a change proposal is in order. Would you be willing to write one up? (@Michelle (Moseman) Miller may be able to get the fix in before we lock STU 3)

Both Communication and CommunicationRequest support Group in the current build.
http://build.fhir.org/communicationrequest-definitions.html#CommunicationRequest.recipient
http://build.fhir.org/communication-definitions.html#Communication.recipient
That said, I'll log a tracker to allow Communication.recipient to reference a CareTeam, which is supported for CommunicationRequest
